entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7 except minus 4 near Chetwynd.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 4 near Chetwynd. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
